about_the_game:
It's Free, Try It ;)

Gameplay

Third person souls-like featuring a solid combat mechanic, 5 explorable levels, 3 big boss fights, mobs, cutscenes, unlockables, and a main story.

Lore

The main character of the game is addicted to watching live streams. But whenever he does so, he starts zoning out and daydreaming. In this state, he becomes trapped in his imaginary world fed by the screen before his eyes. To free himself, he needs to explore this world and defeat the entity that's actively triggering his dream.

Playtime

Main story: Should take around 1-3h based on your skill ;)
Unlocking all items: 2-5h
Feel free to speedrun the game! In fact, I heavily encourage you to do so!

Have Fun Fellow Gamer ;)

name: StreamerBeater

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos
